うん、確かにメイン通路はあっちよ。でも、機甲兵器の邪魔がきっと入ってくるわ。だから、あまり知られていない補修通路を行った方がいいと思うの。
응, 확실히 메인 통로는 저쪽이야. 하지만 기갑병기의 방해가 분명 들어올 거야. 그래서, 잘 알려지지 않은 보수 통로로 가는 게 좋을 것 같아.
No no...this one is the main road, but if you go from here you will definitely encounter a lot of mecha weapons blocking, so it would be better to take this emergency route.

1402: Really…the reason is simple, I'm the designer of the ship, I know every details about it, for Sin……she might just get familiar with it by living here for long.
是么…原因很简单，我是这搜船的设计者，对于月光王座内的所有细节我都了如指掌，而杏的话…大概只是在这里生活久了自然而然就熟悉了吧。
そうね……理由は簡単よ。私がこの月光王座の設計者だから。この船のことは全部把握してるわ。シンは……ここで長い間暮らしてたからね、大体のことがわかると思うわ。
그래…… 이유는 간단해. 내가 이 월광왕좌의 설계자니까. 이 배에 관한 건 전부 파악하고 있으니까. 신은…… 여기서 오랫동안 살았으니까, 대충은 알 거라 생각해.

Is it...the reason is simple, I am the designer of this search ship, for the moonlight throne within all the details I know like the back of my hand, and apricot words...probably just live here for a long time naturally familiar with it.

Well, ...... the reason is simple. Because I am the designer of the Moonlight Throne. I know everything about this ship. Shin has lived ...... here for a long time, so I think I know most of what's going on.
1403: Don't worry, Sin lives here longer than me, she should have gone to every places she can, so at least she shouldn't get lost.
放心吧，杏在这艘船里生活的时间可比我还久，以她的个性一定把所有能去的地方都摸了个遍了吧，所以至少是不会迷路的。
安心して、シンは私よりこの船にいた時間が長いのよ。あの子の性格からして、この艦の入れるところには全部行ってるはず、迷子になることはないと思うわ。
안심해, 신은 나보다 이 배에 있던 시간이 더 길어. 애 성격상, 이 함선의 들어갈 수 있는 곳에는 다 가봤을 테니, 길 잃을 일은 없다고.
Don't worry, Apricot has been living in this ship for longer than I have, and with her personality she must have touched all the places she can go, so at least she won't get lost.
Rest assured, Shin has been on this ship longer than I have. With her personality, I'm sure she's been to all the places this ship can get into, and I don't think she'll get lost.
1404: bgm
speaker
bg
portraits
msg

This Moonlight Throne has a very different design approach compared to Hyperion, Hyperion needs different space as a transport operation ship, but Moonlight Throne is different, it relys on UAV, so has a larger space of the cabin.
这艘月光王座和休伯利安的设计思路有很大的不同，休伯利安号作为女武神的运输作战舰艇需要兼顾到很多人员活动区域，但是月光王座不同，它是以无人机架作为主要作战单位，因此舱室的设计就会宽大许多。
この月光王座は、ハイペリオンのコンセプトと全く違うの。ハイペリオンは、戦乙女の輸送作戦艦艇として人員の動線も考えなきゃいけないようになってる。けど、月光王座は無人機を主要戦力にしてるから、格納庫が広くなってるのよ。
이 월광왕좌는 히페리온의 컨셉과 완전히 달라. 히페리온은 전투처녀의 수송 작전함으로서 인원의 동선도 고려해야 하게 돼 있지만. 하지만 월광왕좌는 무인기를 주력으로 삼고 있으니, 격납고가 넓어진 거야.

This moonlight throne and Hublian design ideas are very different, Hublian as the Valkyrie transport combat ships need to take into account a lot of personnel activity area, but the moonlight throne is different, it is a drone rack as the main combat unit, so the design of the cabin will be much wider.

This Moonlight Throne is completely different from the Hyperion concept. The Hyperion is designed to be a transport operation ship for war maidens, which also requires the consideration of personnel flow lines. However, the Gekko Oza has a wider hangar because it uses unmanned vehicles as its main force.
msg
But you must feel nervous when enter here for the first time, because its design style is quite advanced, the huge corridor can be very depressing when nothing is there……
不过你第一次进入这艘船的话还是会有些不安吧，因为它的设计风格还是挺超前的，这种巨大的回廊在空无一物的时候的确会让人有些压抑……
初めてこの艦に入る人は、少し戸惑うことがあるでしょうね。一応、これのデザインはかなり前衛的にしてあるから。それに、こう通路が広くてスカスカだと落ち着かないのよ、私……。
처음 이 함선에 들어오는 사람은 조금 당황할 수 있겠네. 일단, 이거 디자인이 상당히 전위적으로 되어 있으니까. 게다가, 이렇게 통로가 넓적하고 텅 비어 있으면 안정감이 없어, 나…….

But you will still be a little uneasy if you enter this ship for the first time, because its design style is still quite ahead of its time, this huge corridor in the absence of a thing does make people a little depressed ......

I think people entering this ship for the first time may be a little confused. In case you're wondering, the design of this thing is pretty avant-garde. And I don't feel comfortable when the aisles are wide and scanty like this, I .......

ここの機甲兵器は過去の戦闘でとっくに壊れたんだろ？一応、ここは月光王座の心臓部だしな。
여기의 기갑 병기는 과거 전투에서 이미 부서진 거잖아? 일단 여기는 월광왕좌의 심장부이기도 하고.
The mecha weapons here have long been broken in the previous battle, right? After all, this is the heart of the Moonlight Throne~
The armored weapons here have long since been destroyed in past battles, right? In case you're wondering, this is the heart of the Moonlight Throne.
You know more than I thought, true…if the purpose is to destroy Moonlight Throne, this is the main direction to attack it.
没想到杏你还想的挺多的嘛，的确…如果要摧毁月光王座的话，这里的确是首要的进攻方向。
よくわかってるわね。確かに月光王座を壊すなら、ここを落とすのがもっとも効率的よ。
잘 알고 있네. 확실히 월광왕좌를 부수려면 여기를 공격하는 게 가장 효율적이지.
I didn't expect you to think much about it, indeed... If you want to destroy the Moonlight Throne, this is indeed the primary direction of attack.
You know exactly what I mean. Surely, if you want to destroy the Moonlight Throne, the most efficient way is to drop it here.
Of course! I've been thinking how to destroy this battleship for a while~
那当然！有段时间我可是天天想着怎么弄坏这艘战舰呢~
当然だろ！この艦を壊す方法を考えたことあるからな！
당연하지! 이 함선을 파괴하는 방법을 생각해본 적 있거든!
Of course! I've been thinking about how to break this ship for a while.
Of course not! I've thought of ways to destroy this ship before!
Coo…ok, I took back what I've said…please don't ever think about such things……
咕…好吧，前言撤回…你以后还是少想一些这种事情吧……
はぁ……前言撤回するわ……そういうことは、できれば考えないでちょうだい……。
하아… 앞말 취소할게… 그런 건 가능하면 하지 말아줘…
Goo...well, the preamble withdrawn...you'd better think less about such things in the future ......
Huh. ...... I take back my previous statement. ...... Please don't think about those things if you can help it. ......
Here it is…this is the final door to the power unit, we will get there after this.
就是这里了…这扇隔离门是通往动力炉的最后一道闸门，只要打开它我们就到了。
ここよ……このドアを開ければ動力炉に辿り着くわ。
여기야… 이 문을 열면 동력로에 도달해.
This is it...this isolation door is the last gate to the power furnace, just open it and we're there.
Here it is: ...... Open this door and you'll reach the power reactor.
You get prepared, I will open the door, according to the data, the Honkai energy of this area is all from there, we need to be careful.
你们做好战斗准备，我去打开这扇大门，从仪器检测到的数据来看，这个区域的崩坏能都是从那里涌出来的，所以一定要保持警惕。
ドアを開けるから、戦闘準備をしておいて。データによると崩壊エネルギーは、この中から溢れてきてるわ。気をつけて。
문을 열 거니까 전투 준비해둬. 데이터에 따르면 붕괴 에너지가 이 안에서 넘쳐나고 있다고. 조심해.
You guys get ready for battle, I'm going to open this door. From the data detected by the instruments, the collapse energy in this area is coming out from there, so be sure to stay alert.
I'm going to open the door, so get ready for battle. Data shows that the disintegrating energy is flooding out of this thing. Be careful.
Huh…Hopefully there're no Honkai creatures rushing out……
呼…希望不要忽然有崩坏生物冲出来就好……

휴, 붕괴 생물이 나타나지 않으면 좋겠는데…….
Phew...I hope no collapsed creatures suddenly come out of the woodwork ......
Whew, I hope no disintegrating organisms spring up. ......

The mecha defense along the way is quite weak, only here…maybe during the war, this door is not shut, to let intruders enter the power unit……
